alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 9:05PM EST until February 17 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd) affecting Brooks and Lowndes Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd), Quitman (US 84)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd). * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 135.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Langdale Park floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 136.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EST Wednesday was 137.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 131.0 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 135.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 136.8 feet on 03/20/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
